data.system_settings: Windows 10 Professional x64 - Fall Creators Update
data.expected_result: Garry's Mod should show up as an option for application window.
data.short_description: Garry's Mod Not Showing up in Windows Application for Screen-sharing
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Garry's Mod installed - Launch the game. - Start the video call - Attempt to screen-share Garry's Mod by application window
